FuncDef: This command enables the addition of dynamic entries to the proxy-ND table. The command is disabled by default. When executed, the system will populate proxy-ND entries from snooped Neighbor Advertisement (NA) messages on SAPs/SDP-bindings, in addition to the entries coming from EVPN (if the EVPN is enabled). These entries will be shown as dynamic, as opposed to EVPN entries or static entries.
